refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.parameters;
args
Configuration arguments. The possible keys are:
VARNISH_CONFIG_IDENT - local varnish instance ident VARNISH_CONFIG_HOST - varnish instance ip VARNISH_CONFIG_PORT - varnish instance port VARNISH_CONFIG_SECRET - varnish instance secret VARNISH_CONFIG_TIMEOUT - connection read timeout
